title: With a little friendly help
creator_credit: Brian Benson and Department of Commercial and Industrial Development Queensland
brief_description: Queensland’s Department of Industrial Development (DID) assists the development and production of innovation by establishing industrial estates. This film surveys the estates in Queensland and highlights some of the industries supported on these.
